text: over 100 million americans suffer from diabetes or some type of diabetic condition primarily most those people suffer from type 2 diabetes
incretins are a set of drugs that help type 2 diabetics regulate their insulin levels and their blood sugar there has been spontaneous reporting to
the fda about increating causing pancreatic cancer in fact some studies have shown that if you're taking these incretin drugs
you're two and a half times more likely to get pancreatic cancer the incretin drugs that the carlson law firm is taking cases on involving pancreatic cancer involved
biata genuvia janumet anglyza and victoza today the companies that produce these drugs aren't even warning about this danger
it's so important for us to hold these drug companies accountable for the dangers they cause that they don't tell us about and so it's very important
if you or a loved one has taken one of these drugs and been diagnosed with pancreatic cancer you contact our law firm so one we can get you in the lawsuit
that is in san diego currently going but two that we can send a message to these drug makers that they should warn the public about
the known dangers of taking their products [Music] you
